Entries.default: <ispeech>If the Watcher of Caed Nua is participating in the Crucible, then perhaps we have some reasonable hope of a worthwhile challenge.</ispeech>

The words strike your mind as you walk by a gang of five warriors, some wearing expressionless faces, the others poorly-veiled smiles. The presumptive leader of the gang stares at you with an unerring focus. She's likely the source of the mental communication.
<ispeech>I think you mistake yourself for someone of my size.</ispeech>
"If you're itching for a fight, we can take this into the arena..."
"No need to show off, you can just use your regular voice."
[Say nothing.]
<ispeech>You speak with a proper voice! You will certainly prove a more interesting challenge than these... lesser hunters.</ispeech>
<ispeech>Soon enough, Watcher.</ispeech>
The lead member of the group cocks her head to the left, and the others mimic the gesture moments after.
<ispeech>I shall speak slowly, that your simple mind might keep pace.</ispeech>
The lead member of the group cocks her head to the left, and the others mimic the gesture moments after.
<ispeech>A pleasure to see other skilled practitioners. Should we face off, it will be a shame to have to slay you.</ispeech>
<ispeech>May Toamowhai bless your efforts in the arena.</ispeech>
[Imagine yourself brutally murdering the five warriors in vivid detail.]

<ispeech>While the warrior in me would welcome such a true contest of skill, I concur - slaying another expert feels akin to wasting good wine.</ispeech>

A ghost of a smile graces her otherwise expressionless face.
<ispeech>And may he bless you as well! I'm sure our fight will be the match of the season - I do so hope the culling leaves our two packs in the end.</ispeech>
<ispeech>Cute. Savor your little fantasies. When we are thrown into the Crucible together, we will dispatch you with equal fervor.</ispeech>
The Quiet Five bow deeply, and in near-perfect synchronization.
[Bow respectfully.] <ispeech>Then until we meet again.</ispeech>
<ispeech>May we meet again in sacred battle.</ispeech>
"Now I'm wondering... will you still be nice and quiet when I'm pounding on your skull?"

Coughs and cleared throats murmur through the group, though no words are spoken or heard in your mind.

The leader raises a hand, then slowly closes it into a fist.
"I'm [Player Name], and I'm guessing you're our competition."
<ispeech>We are the Quiet Five. Many have come to this island seeking victory, but we possess skills and training beyond mere strength of arms.</ispeech>
<ispeech>Never before has a group come so perfectly prepared for the patronage of the Seeker.</ispeech>
"May Toamowhai bless your strength and grant you victory in the Crucible."
The quintet turn from you as one and stride towards the arena's applause.
You find yourself again facing the efficient, coordinated movements of the Quiet Five.

<ispeech>You believe you've chosen to be here. You have not. Every movement you made was orchestrated to bring you here. To us.</ispeech>

One corner of the woman's mouth rises in a faint smirk.
"Serafen, eject this bastard from my mind. If she wants to talk, she can use her tongue."

"Aye, captain."

A tingling sensation runs down your spine as the orlan cipher shields your thoughts from tampering.
The five snort as one - derisively. The woman shrugs, and the champions turn and walk away without another glance.
A pulse of warm amusement rolls between her mind and yours, the psychic equivalent of a nod.

Coughs and cleared throats murmur through the group, though no words are spoken or heard in your mind.

The leader raises a hand, then slowly closes it into a fist.
They bow to you, a single motion quintupled.
<ispeech>We eagerly anticipate this, Watcher. Will you rise to your reputation? Or does your legend end here, flattened under a superior intellect?</ispeech>
<ispeech>You may be the challenger, but we are the chosen. Expect no easy victory today, Watcher of Caed Nua - and no mercy.</ispeech>
<ispeech>Who are you showing off for? No one can hear you.</ispeech>
[Bow to them.] "May the best kith win."
"I offer none in return."
"For the quiet type, you sure do talk a lot."
<ispeech>I look forward to this, though I will take no pleasure in dispatching you.</ispeech>
<ispeech>I think you'll find me more than mere legend.</ispeech>
[Bow to them.] <ispeech>May the best of us win.</ispeech>
<ispeech>In that, we are well matched.</ispeech>
<ispeech>We will hold you to it.</ispeech>
<ispeech>Doubtless they will.</ispeech>
The Quiet Five stare at you, expressionless and silent.
<ispeech>Nor would we expect you to.</ispeech>
<ispeech>Let us not keep the public waiting. They do so love their sport.</ispeech>
<ispeech>Welcome to the end of your story. Pray make it climactic.</ispeech>
<ispeech>And may he bless you as well! I'm sure our fight will be the match of the season - I do so hope the culling leaves our two packs in the end.</ispeech>
<ispeech>We are the Quiet Five. Many have come to this island seeking victory, but we possess skills and training beyond mere strength of arms.</ispeech>
<ispeech>Never before has a group come so perfectly prepared for the patronage of the Seeker.</ispeech>
